actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to exclude certain employee productivity awards from gross income.
short_title: American Business Productivity and Quality Enhancement Act of 1993

summary.text: American Business Productivity and Quality Enhancement Act of 1993 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude from gross income certain awards for employee productivity or quality achievement, limited to a specified amount.

titles.title: American Business Productivity and Quality Enhancement Act of 1993
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to exclude certain employee productivity awards from gross income.
